CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1952, pg. 20, reads: "Everybody's Singing 'Cry'...It Tops Hit-Tune List! Churchill Kohlman, right, Pittsburgh night watchman and author of the latest top tune, 'Cry' with Johnnie Ray, singer, who helped skyrocket the song. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Johnnie Ray and Churchill Kohlman holding sheet music for their song "Cry"
